AUTHOR: PookaMustard
INSTALL_MSG: Command Request cog installed. You can now use [p]commandrequest to accept community command requests into your bot development channel. Make sure your development channel is set via [p]savechannelid [channelid], which you can obtain via Discord's Developer Mode.
NAME: Command Request
SHORT: Cog for collecting custom command suggestions and sending them into one channel.
DESCRIPTION: Cog for collecting custom command suggestions by users from any channel and sending them into one development channel, useful if you add commands for a community or many. Credits to calebj for the original debug command.
